p: Filone et al. (2010) showed that thioridazine inhibits the Rift Valley fever virus in 293T cells (IC 50 = 26.2 μM). Noteworthy, IC 50 values were calculated only for non-toxic compounds. Furthermore, they found that the drug also inhibited RVFV MP12 infection in the HeLa and Vero cells ( Filone et al., 2010).
